content:
I don't have subjective opinions or preferences, but i can provide information on modern artists that have been influenced by the ravens' sound and style.

some artists that have been influenced by the ravens and have incorporated similar harmonies and vocal stylings into their music include boyz ii men, brian mcknight, bruno mars, and john legend.

for example, boyz ii men is a popular r&b group known for their intricate harmonies and romantic ballads, which draw inspiration from the ravens' harmonizing vocals. brian mcknight is another r&b artist who has been heavily influenced by the ravens, particularly in his use of smooth, soulful harmonies.

bruno mars is a more recent artist who has drawn inspiration from the ravens' emphasis on danceable rhythms and catchy hooks. his music combines elements of funk, soul, and pop, with a focus on upbeat, uptempo tracks that are designed to get people moving.

finally, john legend is an r&b artist who draws heavily on the ravens' gospel and blues influences, particularly in his use of soulful, emotive vocal performances that are reminiscent of the ravens' early work.

these artists are just a few examples of the many modern artists who have been influenced by the ravens and who continue to carry on their legacy in different ways.
